section.title: Adding Monasca Transform and Spark to &kw-hos; Deployment
section.para: Since Monasca Transform and Spark are optional components, the users might elect to not install these two components during their initial &kw-hos; install. The following instructions provide a way the users can add Monasca Transform and Spark to their existing &kw-hos; deployment.

listitem.para: Add Monasca Transform and Spark to the input model. Monasca Transform and Spark on a entry level cloud would be installed on the common control plane, for mid scale cloud which has a MML (Metering, Monitoring and Logging) cluster, Monasca Transform and Spark will should be added to MML cluster.
Add spark and monasca-transform to input model, control_plane.yml
listitem.screen:
clusters - name: core cluster-prefix: c1 server-role: CONTROLLER-ROLE member-count: 3 allocation-policy: strict service-components:
[...]
- zookeeper - kafka - cassandra - storm - spark - monasca-api - monasca-persister - monasca-notifier - monasca-threshold - monasca-client - monasca-transform
[...]

&prompt.ardana;cd ~/openstack/my_cloud/definition &prompt.ardana;git add -A &prompt.ardana;git commit -m "Adding Monasca Transform and Spark" &prompt.ardana;cd ~/openstack/ardana/ansible &prompt.ardana;ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost config-processor-run.yml
